author: Grillribba
install_msg: Thanks for installing OnePieceGuess! Use `[p]opguess help`.
name: OnePieceGuess
short: Timed One Piece guessing game with blurred images.
description: Posts periodic One Piece character challenges. Image is blurred; users guess with fuzzy matching. Fully configurable interval, reward, pool, blur mode/strength. Optional payout via BeriCore.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores minimal configuration (enabled/channel/interval/reward/blur, active round) and a list of character names and optional aliases; no personal data beyond Discord IDs for win counts.
